rules_text:
Tap up to two target nonland permanents. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.
Return up to two target tapped permanents to their owner's hands. Draw a card for each permanent returned to the hand in this way.
Gain control of all tapped permanents. They become snow in addition to their other types.
special_text:
[+2]: Tap up to two target nonland permanents. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.
[-3]: Return up to two target tapped permanents to their owner's hands. Draw a card for each permanent returned to the hand in this way.
[-10]: Gain control of all tapped permanents. They become snow in addition to their other types.
